markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dimensional Knot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1004)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catalyst" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=396" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 168 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="" /><row>Cast a Spell</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

[Shelynites](/Deities.aspx?ID=17) originally crafted this complex knot of vibrant string for bracelets meant to tie the destinies of two people together. Now, however, spellcasters of all religions use them to enhance their capacity with teleportation magic. Adding this catalyst to a 4th-level [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) spell allows you to bring a single willing adjacent creature along with you; however, the teleportation is somewhat disorienting for them, causing them to become [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dimensional Knot

Now, however, spellcasters of all religions use them to enhance their capacity with teleportation magic. Adding this catalyst to a 4th-level dimension door spell allows you to bring a single willing adjacent creature along with you; however, the teleportation is somewhat disorienting for them, causing them to become stunned 1.
